Thank You For Registering

Thank you for registering for the Advanced Digital Marketing Workshop coming to Philadelphia on Wednesday, June 6th, 2017.
Make sure to share this event with your friends and business associates.

To Register Visit www.website.com/eventname.html

STOP! You are 1 more step away from confirming your registration

The most important step is that you confirm your attendance for this event. Check your email for an email from events@paulklebanov.com with an auto-confirm link. Look in your spam box as well.

If you don't receive the email within a few moments please email events@paulklebanov.com to confirm your attendance.
